summary: Fix for NPC and Followers Annoying magic sounds still playing after combat
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=#4F81BD]
[CENTER]
[SIZE=6]Magic Sounds Loop fix[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=4]
This mod will fix all the looping sounds that are constantly playing after an NPC has been killed or if your follower leaves combat.[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]

[SIZE=6]To Install[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD]Manual or use NMM to install the mod[/COLOR]

[SIZE=6]To Uninstall[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD]Manual or use NMM to uninstall the mod[/COLOR]
author: GRIMELEVEN
